location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah, to Andrew Jukes Esq. at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Charles Pasley, Acting for Brigadier General John Malcolm at the Camp at Mohumrah [Mohammerah, Iran], to Andrew Jukes Esq. at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 31 January 1809 via the Furyand requesting him to deliver to Davidson the packet from Sir Harford Jones to be delivered to Brigadier General Malcolm, containing the request to resume his station in the Gulf.
